content: great-granny fletcher was an odd bird on the surface she appeared to be what people expected from a woman of her era but granny was just a little different from the other ladies of her day this half-a-granny follows suit ~ **it s just a little different** than the other birds & different than outward appearances lead one to believe this wingspan of this half-granny grows wider as the body grows in depth giving it a somewhat obtuse angle which as many people have noted makes it easier to wear the gauge listed is for worsted yarn because that is what my original sample was worked in but thanks to the nature of this pattern it will work for **any yarn** and **any hook** - and any combination of the two so use that gorgeous yarn that you don t want to waste a drop of i love using a little bigger than recommended by the yarn size hook for this shawl the looser gauge gives a comfy feel and makes blocking out the full width of the long edge easier and honestly i just love a little more drape whenever possible this shawl is dedicated to great-granny fletcher you rock my world note if you downloaded this pattern prior to 9 february 2018 - - please download the updated version apologies for any trouble &/or gray hair the original version may have caused 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/the-seventh-floor/2908414/1376-1400#1383
